events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund as the size does not fit me properly and I am unhappy with the purchase.
The customer's request to return the jacket is categorized under the Refund cluster due to refund and return keywords mentioned.
Assigning the refund request case to the returns department to assist the customer with their refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket purchase. I am here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please confirm your order number and let us know if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way?
The order number is 987654321. The jacket is unused and in perfect condition, but unfortunately the size is just too small for me.
We can initiate the refund process for you right away. Please use the prepaid return label attached in this email to send back the jacket.
Thank you for the quick response and the return label. I will send the jacket back today and appreciate your assistance.
We have received your returned jacket and processed the refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if everything is satisfactory with the resolution provided.
As you have confirmed receiving the refund, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and please contact us anytime.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback on your recent refund experience. We appreciate your input.
